coming_of_age.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
coming_of_age.author: Stephen Chbosky
coming_of_age.description: A coming-of-age story about friendship, self-discovery, and finding your place in the world.

fantasy_worldbuilding.title: The Name of the Wind
fantasy_worldbuilding.author: Patrick Rothfuss
fantasy_worldbuilding.description: A legendary hero tells his own story in a richly detailed fantasy world with complex magic.

dystopian.title: The Hunger Games
dystopian.author: Suzanne Collins
dystopian.description: A girl fights for survival in a brutal televised competition in a dystopian future.

unreliable_narrators.title: We Were Liars
unreliable_narrators.author: E. Lockhart
unreliable_narrators.description: A mysterious story with an unreliable narrator and shocking revelations.

character_driven.title: The Fault in Our Stars
character_driven.author: John Green
character_driven.description: A deeply emotional character-driven story about two teenagers facing illness.
